name: An Eternity Gone By
storyline:
It is said that every thirty years monsters descend upon Starblast Village. Everyone knows not to leave home during this event - everyone except for Mirai Starblazer.

That night, Mirai convinces her best friend Kako to sneak out and watch the stars. However, during their outing the two are ambushed by monsters and Kako is abducted and taken away to a mysterious world. Mirai ventures after her, not yet realizing just how long this journey will take…
It will take more than one attempt for Mirai to save Kako. Mirai might not have enough time on the first attempt. And with every failed attempt, time will pass and Mirai and the worlds she visits will change.

Follow Mirai through the different phases of her life. With age comes new perspectives as well as new abilities on the battlefield!
summary: Use your telekinetic powers to hurl watermelons, lamp posts, toilets and more at the monsters roaming this strange yet familiar world. You’ll take the role of Mirai: a young sorceress trying to save her friend from the monsters who’ve abducted her.
